title: Friends List deleted?
body:
Logged in 6/25/2017 and had nothing wrong, logged in at 12:40 EST on 6/26/2017 to find "Looks like you haven't added any friends yet."

Any chance I can have my friends list back? Any idea how this happened? 

Thank you.

replies.body: Just wanted to mention that I had this problem, too.  Same "solution"...it just went away the next time I logged in.  I put in a bug report also.
Weeeeeiiiiiiird.......I'm still able to see your friends from this side. Try refreshing the client a couple times and let me know if they don't ever show back up.
It fixed thank you for your reply. ^_^
